reviews.title: Good value for money
reviews.text: Nice hotel and very well located close to the city center. The hotel was renovated recently. The internet rate was very good. I would go to this hotel again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice hotel. After reading all of the other reviews, we decided to try this place out and we are glad that we did. The staff was very helpful and we did not have any issues at all with the room. Our request for a specific room was granted and they were very nice about giving us our room a little early. After flying from the US, being able to go to our room right away was a very nice and unexpected touch. The room was very clean and the towels were changed every day. Our only issue was with the shower, the water wasn't always consistent. Several times we had to get out of the flow because it would change to really hot or really cold for a minute or so. Other than that we didn't have any issues. The kitchenette was a nice touch too. We were able to save a lot of money by keeping leftovers and buying some snacks at the stores in town. The hotel is also in a nice location, easy walk from the Museum station. When you arrive, book the shuttle service back to the airport, it is cheaper than paying the station fee from the subway and it is nice to have door to door service. We would definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: Would stay there again!

reviews.text: As long as you don't expect any kind of luxury accommodation, I think you would struggle to find a better value place to stay in Sydney than the Travelodge, especially if you get a special rate. It's not too far to walk from central station, although I later found out there was a closer station. The rooms were acceptable, clean and had the facilities I would expect - TV, tea making facilities, iron. There was also a fridge and microwave if you are staying for a while or on a budget. Didn't bother with breakfast there with countless other breakfast options nearby. In summary, OK hotel, fantastic price!
reviews.title: Fantastic.....for the price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for a few nights in July. We were happy with the location, although you were about 10 minutes from most things...but you were close enough to see the sights.
reviews.title: Ok option for a low budget in Sydney

reviews.text: Our room was recently refurbished, and just felt like a normal, budget hotel. It was relatively clean, the bathroom was small but functional & there was a kettle and microwave.
reviews.title: Good location - good price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Exactly what you’d expect. Clean, comfortable and cheap. About 45 mins from Opera House but still quite central and it is near the Museum train station. It's quite new and well equipped. One bad thing was that the wireless was ridiculously expensive, but otherwise highly recommend as a base to explore the city.
reviews.title: It's a travelodge - it does what it says on the tin

reviews.text: Arrived at this hotel off a flight from Perth,WA
reviews.title: Great hotel, but is a bit out of the way from the main tourist attractions

reviews.text: First impressions: spacious but busy, appeared to be a popular hotel for people going nighclubbing.
reviews.title: Great hotel at a great price.

reviews.text: The rooms were spacious and clean, good choice of tv channels, but apart from that noth much to say, no pool/gym facilities.
reviews.title: great hotel, great location, fantastic value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A good but basic hotel to explore Sydney from
reviews.title: Would never stay again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is situated two minutes walk from Hyde park which leads you straight to the Opera House and harbour area. The rooms are large with a small kitchen area consisting of a microwave fridge and kettle.
reviews.title: Great value, great location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in the Surrey Hills district which is great for eating out at night.
reviews.title: Sydney's Best Bargain

reviews.text: Sydney is an expensive city to visit -- except for the travelodge. The front desk was friendly. The rooms were very clean and quiet. They were properly cleaned each day. The amenities were of a high calibre. The hotel is located close to major attractions, the subway was easily accessible. What a great place at a great price. You cannot find better for this price.
reviews.title: All considered - it's good value

reviews.text: I have been staying in the is hotel for work for a number of years. It is not an Aman Resort and it seem to be permanently filled with tour groups but you can get it for less than AUD $100 per night so what can you expect. It is relatively new hotel and the de core is mid range. The rooms are clean and the staff at the front desk are pleasant. Do not expect to find them anywhere elce. For a hotel in this price bracket it is one of if not the best. Location is ok - it is on the SE corner of the CBD and you can not see any of the famous Sydney land marks but for work - it was and is perfect. Close to public transport (metro trains and buses) with China town two blocks down the street.
reviews.title: Perfect place with wonderful location

reviews.text: We stayed in Trvaleodge for 4 days during out Sydney trip. I would say I am totally satisfied. We stayed in Queensize bed room with our 3 year kid.
reviews.title: Not Impressed
it was ok
reviews.text: Trailfinders booked this hotel for us, and to be honest id'd probably shop around abit if we had to go back to Sydney.

The hotel was quite basic, the staff member who booked us in was not overly friendly, we had to ask about.... booking breakfast ( having read a special offer board on the check in desk), about where we were in Sydney and could we have a map, what room number we were in, what time we could check in, if we could leave our bags.... looking back i can't belive i didn't say anything! Ive never been to a hotel where i had to drag the answers out of the desk staff!
reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On arriving at 11 our room wasn't ready so we left our bags and went back an hour later where another staff member dealt with us and she immediatley gave us our room keys. (she was much friendlier!!)
reviews.title: Clean, friendly and good location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was ok, it was very spacious, had a microwave and a fridge! It was certainly clean but just a little tired, same with the bathroom.
reviews.title: Great Location, Sweet hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast? Very over rated! We paid for it on booking in as this gave us $6 off each, which was good as i wouldnt have paid full price for it! They did have hot items but the only decent thing on offer was the coffee... which was fab!
reviews.title: Good location, hotel clean and comfortable
